website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Originals Shadow 5000 exhibits a shoe design that is ahead of its time. It was originally designed for performance, but now it’s all about comfort. This kick is very well engineered with thorough cushioning for maximum coziness. The on-point style and hues always keep the users’ sneaker game fresh. For buyers who are into throwback runners with high-quality materials, cozy fit, and eye-catching colorways, buying a pair of the Saucony Shadow 5000 is a practical idea.
pros: A handful of users say that they feel comfortable while wearing the Saucony Shadow 5000
The majority of buyers praise the stylish design of this shoe
This sneaker is available at an affordable price
Many commend the vast array of color combinations available in the market
Most of the wearers like the sufficient amount of cushioning
This shoe has excellent foot support, many wearers have said
A handful of buyers like that this pair comes with extra shoelaces
Some users like the extensive lacing system
It gives the foot a secure fit without suffocating it
Many wearers commend the durable outsole
The majority of buyers note about the lightness of this pair
cons: Few wearers express disappointment about the narrow width of the Shadow 5000 of Saucony
An online user gripes that the colors of the sneaker are different from the one posted online

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photos. Weird material.
customer_reviews.text: Was not pleased with this order. The material on the shoe is much different in reality than the pictures show. It is more like a raggedy towel than the smooth suede shown in the picture. It’s a bummer because I have been wearing Saucony for years. Would think twice before buying Sauconys from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The shoe in the image is not the same as what I received. The material is a much more ragged finish on the sneakers received. I’m bummed. I want the shoe that was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the reviews. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson. I haven’t given them to him yet but I am very disappointed with the quality. I really think they are fake saucony. The suede is so long it needs combing. Looks like the van in the movie Dumber and Dumber.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moss

customer_reviews.title: These are knock-offs....not real Saucony
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this model for 30 years....these are not Saucony as far as I can tell !! Buyer beware !
customer_reviews.author: Frank Callucci

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and cute. Just the material is little bit weird. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gela

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and look as portrayed in the photos. These are durable and quality shoes with a nice aesthetic. They’re also very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Yamazon

customer_reviews.title: We have a 🏆!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my soon and he loves them. Comfort level 1-5 is a 5 according to my soon (18yrs old) whom is very picky with shoes. Asked if he wld mind me getting some for my self and he said no. I really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my mother, she loved them, great shoe, and quick delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti O. S. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FRIGGIN SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, reminded me of the newer NB “dad shoes” but with more style. They fit great and I wear them daily for anything from skateboarding to work
customer_reviews.author: Ben Holt

customer_reviews.title: Yep they’re saucony
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Comfortable. Shipped fast. Color is more blue than the picture indicates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They feel good had mine for a while now and fit and still pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Cruz luis

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love saucony! Very comfortable and fabric are very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite style of sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Saucony shoes are always super comfortable and these are as well. The way the tongue is attached to the upper allows you to slips the shoes on and off without re-tying them every time.
customer_reviews.author: NorthEast81

customer_reviews.title: More like orange
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the color. Looked orange. Didn't even them out of the box. A send back for sure. But they came well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am Very sutisfyied. My second Saucony (first one was Shadow). Stylish and comfortable. Color a litle bit different, more like tuna meat.
customer_reviews.author: fima

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these were cheap knockoffs of the originals. I had bought the originals at twice the price. Thought I was getting a bargain. Sent them back and kept the real ones. Don’t be fooled!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a great sale. They are very comfortable. The leather is starting to patina. I love saucony. These are my daily shoes. Great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jepson

product_meta.title: Saucony Originals Men's Shadow 5000 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Introducing the latest member of the Originals Modern Collection - the Shadow 5000. With our tired push in clean aesthetics and performance-inspired elements in fashion sneakers, the Shadow 5000 is above the rest. With our padded platform the classic lines of the original Shadow 5000 merge – we have created the market leader in everyday life.
